CustomField.description: SUMS up the TRUE values in the Gift/Pledges history section for the past 3 fiscal years, giving one point for each fiscal year the person gave a gift.
CustomField.formula: IF((Last_Year_Giver__c == TRUE),1,0) + IF((Two_Years_Ago_Giver__c == TRUE),1,0) + IF((Three_Years_Ago_Giver__c == TRUE),1,0)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: SUMS up the TRUE values in the Gift/Pledges history section for the past 3 fiscal years, giving one point for each fiscal year the person gave a gift.
CustomField.label: Giver Last 3 Years Score
